text: opt for a “Cremerolle” instead. 22. Luxemburgerli What is it? Those famous, meringue-based macarons come in all flavours imaginable. Sprüngli, the inventor of the Luxemburgerli, offers a wide basic assortment as well as seasonal creations. Your choice comes down to flavours like Black Forest, mandarine, cinnamon, champagne, vanilla, chocolate, hazelnut, raspberry and many more. Due to their costliness, Luxemburgerli are not something you lightheadedly pig out on. Their smallest box with your choice of four macarons costs around 4.80 CHF. So if you feel like treating yourself to something special, investing in a box of Luxemburgerli is an excellent choice. Where can you buy it? You can buy Luxemburgerli at every Sprüngli store across Switzerland. Or the world, for that matter. If you’re looking for a place to blow your splurge fund, head to Sprüngli and buy a box of “Luxemburgerli”.
